items.title: Palestinians Stream Back to Northern Gaza on Foot

items.title: Suspected Sabotage of Deep-Sea Cable Triggers First NATO-Led Response

items.title: Rwanda-Backed Rebels Enter Congo's Safe-Haven City
items.content_html: Residents of Goma reported gunfire and shelling after rebels overran Congolese troops. U.N. officials estimated that more than one million displaced people were now inside the city.

items.title: Kim Jong Un Is Doing Everything He Can to Keep North Korea's Youth in Line
